summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackILIA Skin Rewind Complexion Stick is a long-wear foundation + concealer stick with weightless coverage and firming skincare ingredients.
details: DetailsBenefitsBuildable, medium coverageNatural-matte finishBlurringUp to 12-hour wearSmooths, firms + visibly reduces wrinkles over timeNon-comedogenic + dermatologist-testedFormulated without fragranceKey IngredientsCeramide-Peptide Complexâ€”Visibly firms and strengthens the skin barrierWinged Kelp Extractâ€”Potent replenisher that restores luminosity, helping skin look more youthfulButterfly Lavender Extractâ€”Botanical powerhouse that smooths the look of fine lines and wrinklesResearch Results98% said it blurs pores + makes skin look smooth*91% said it doesn't feel like wearing makeup*100% said skin looks healthier + more youthful**98% said it reduces the look of fine lines + wrinkles***Instant results in a clinical study of 53 people**After 28 days in a clinical study of 53 peopleItem 2635701How To UseTo conceal, use your fingers or a small brush to pick up product and gently pat into skin.For all-over coverage, swipe directly onto skin and blend with your fingers or the ILIA Complexion Brush.For a smooth, hydrated base, prep skin with The Base Face Milk.IngredientsEthylhexyl Palmitate, Polyethylene, Lauroyl Lysine, Diisostearyl Malate, Triethylhexanoin, Mica, Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, Silica, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Tribehenin, Caprylyl Glycol, Behenyl Behenate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ceramide NG, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Lavandula Stoechas Extract, Tocopherol, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12. [+/- (May Contain): CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 77007 (Ultramarines)].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: To conceal, use your fingers or a small brush to pick up product and gently pat into skin.For all-over coverage, swipe directly onto skin and blend with your fingers or the ILIA Complexion Brush.For a smooth, hydrated base, prep skin with The Base Face Milk.

reviews.headline: I have loved this for quick every day use.
reviews.comments: It is very buildable and smooth, a very good amount of product, it is very pigmented. If your skin is very dry just make sure you really prep the skin and hydrate before. It works great for my very sensitive skin. Lots of shades available. It holds up very well, sometimes wears off on my chin but i have been pleased.

reviews.headline: Ilia stick makeup neat, easy application
reviews.comments: This brand is new to me.  I read a review online that suggested this brand.  Application is as easy as drawing on your face and smoothing the makeup with a makeup brush. I prefer one of the IT brushes.. You can apply as much or as little as needed. Coverage is nice. There is no scent..

reviews.headline: I really like this
reviews.comments: I originally tried this with primer and wasn't impressed. So, I figured let me try it without and fell in love. It stays put and doesn't emphasize my wrinkles. I have recommended it to several friends.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I experienced a severe allergic reaction to this product, and to make matters worse, it arrived dented and overpriced. I strongly urge you to consider my request for a refund.

reviews.headline: beautiful finish
reviews.comments: I'm in my mid 30s and starting to get fine lines. I was looking for light to medium coverage that was easy to travel with and quick to apply. I wear 16N and I'm so impressed with the color match! usually foundations pull too yellow or oxidize to orange. I started to think I was olive toned and actually started with that but it was genuinely too green for me. the neutral was perfect. after prepping my skin with moisturizer and letting it absorb, I swipe this beginning around my nose towards my ears, just a couple of light swipes on each cheek and then blend. I set with a pressed powder around my tzone and I'm basically all done. if I have extra spots I want to cover, I dab it on and set with powder. it plays well with my preferred powder blushes and couldn't be easier to travel with or quicker to apply. I haven't had issues with it clinging to dry patches but I also stay consistent with my skincare and it's been humid. I expect I'll need less setting powder in the winter.

reviews.headline: not for oily or combination skin
reviews.comments: the color of this foundation is spot on for me. however, nothing I try keeps the product on! it literally looks perfect for the first 15 minutes, but it never settles on my skin. I can touch my skin and it'll remove all the product. so frustrating! don't recommend for anyone who doesn't have dry to super dry skin. I bought this after I tried the skin tint and I guess this brand just doesn't work for my skin.

reviews.headline: Beautiful on my middle-aged skin!
reviews.comments: I LOVE this foundation, a 10/10. I have dry/combination skin, and I'm 36 so I have fine lines on my forehead and around my eyes. I was having such a hard time finding a foundation that worked for me, I tried Ilia's Super Serum Skin Tint first and hated it, but this product is perfection. It's so easy to apply, and blends out seamlessly with a brush. It feels like nothing on the skin, it's incredibly lightweight. The coverage is light to medium, it's very buildable without getting cakey. It's not matte, it's not dewy, it just looks like skin. It has the most beautiful finish. I set this with a tiny bit of powder and it lasts all day without getting weird or settling into my lines. I highly recommend this!

reviews.headline: Disappointing for the price
reviews.comments:
For the price, I expected more. The coverage is too light and it seems to only settle in my fine lines and stick to any drier spots on my face. I have to reapply throughout the day. Not worth it.
However, it hasn't given me acne yet, unlike other stick foundations I've tried in the past. Overall, this is just not as creamy and full coverage as I'd hoped.

reviews.headline: VERY PLEASED
reviews.comments: I just purchased this foundation stick and am very pleased. It covers and conceals and doesn't look cakey. I love the fact that it has skincare in it, I don't want anything on my face that is not good for my skin. It leaves a beautiful finish. I would definitely purchase this again.

reviews.headline: Daily staple: Can't be without this
reviews.comments: Ideal blend of coverage and natural finish. The same texture as my skin. Not chalky or shiny.

reviews.headline: Best foundation for all skin types
reviews.comments:
I originally used the "find my shade" on Ilia's website as Ultas was not working. Ordered wrong color as the find my shade is not very accurate, so i drove (an hour away) to nearest Ulta Beauty store to exchange and had a beauty consultant color match me. 
I love this foundation! Im 72 and a lot of cream foundations/liquid no longer work for me. No wrinkles at 72 but i love how this foundation blends easy and does not sit on the skin like a mask. Buildable coverage if so desired. Not greasy, shiny or sticky. Doesnt transfer onto things. Great color selection too.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments:
One of my all time favorites!
Goes on so smooth & not heavy looking but has great coverage.

reviews.headline: Best foundation stick
reviews.comments: Absolutely beautiful foundation stick for dry or mature skin.

reviews.headline: Convenient and pretty
reviews.comments: Glides well on the skin ! I think it has enough coverage and good ingredients. I was stuck between this and the milani one . I felt less guilty about it due to the ingredients so i had to splurge . I also was getting tired of having a mess with liquid skin tints . I think this stick foundation was the fastest ans prettiest application of makeup ive has in years , so i feel its worth it

reviews.headline: I'm in love!
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love ghis foundation stick. Feels like im wearing nothing and blends in so well! After a super long day even throigh sweat i still look glowy and natural. I use my clean fingers to rub on the products and apply to my face. I switched from bare minerals to this and havent had any breakouts and my skin looks way healthier! It is pricy but worth it in my opinion especially for how little i use. It did grab onto a dry breakout i had but a bit of
Concealer over it helped alot! If you have dry patches you may need to moisturize first and exfoliate. I love how this wears as well almosy getting better with time. Im a mom of 3 and i find this super easy to wear and apply in a rush!

reviews.headline: Easy to apply nice foundation.
reviews.comments: Color match good, moisturizing full coverage: Easy to apply

reviews.headline: Great for oily skin
reviews.comments: This foundation stick has a drier, matte formula. It's looks like I'm wearing nothing when I blend it in with a brush. I have oily skin. It blends in nicely over both silicone-based and sticky primer. When I used it over just my moisturizer with sunscreen, I needed finishing powder to maintain the matte finish.

reviews.headline: Just like skin!
reviews.comments: I see that there's a lot of mixed reviews but I believe this would work best on combo/oily skin as opposed to dry. I have combo skin and this stick foundation is amazing! It's light coverage and evened out my skin tone and the redness I have. It claims to work as a concealer as well but as someone with acne scars it's not going to be 100% full coverage so you would have to go in with concealer. The foundation stick didn't make me feel dry or oily and this gives me a natural look. It is pricy but I would totally buy this over and over again

reviews.headline: Don't love the texture it gives my skin
reviews.comments: I think its going for a matte vibe but its just a little too chalky for me

reviews.headline: Enhances dry patches
reviews.comments: As I age, I tend to get small patches of dry skin on my face by winter's end. Despite hydrating before applying, this product clings to those areas and makes them more visible than if i had nothing on. After wearing it for a couple of hours I noticed it sinking into my fine lines and wrinkles, therefore making them more pronounced. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone with aging skin.

media.headline: Don't even think about discontinuing! In LOVEðŸ’•
Don't even think about discontinuing! In LOVEðŸ’•

faceoff_positive.comments: Love the thumb indent on this packaging. Helps me from not dropping it during application. I need this on ALL your products ! I have dropped my mascara tube and wand and also the liquid eye shadow. I'm a bit clumsy. Lol. If there was an indent, I probably wouldn't have. Heck put thumb holds on both ends of the mascara tube for easy. I gave this 4 stars because it could use improvement. I have mature skin. It does get flaky with application so I did need to use an applicator to blend in lightly to prevent this and use a soft touch. Do not overwork the product. Using my fingers to blend made more "flakes". Secondly, the coverage isn't as much as I would have liked. I need 2 to 3 passes in trouble areas like around my nose for example. It's not as buildable as the true skin concealer. (Which is amazing) Lastly, the color in the tube is much lighter on the skin. I ordered a color based upon the color match tool online. I also got a custom match through customer service sending an email in a selfie. The CS representative recommended lighter than my online results. I had already ordered the darker shade the website recommended. It was too light. Both would have been. The product goes on lighter than it appears. It does blend well though. So I would err on going a little bit darker or reaching out to CS for a match. I may order 2 colors next time. Recommendations for Ilia would be to add more pictures to the color chosing process. More skin types, more images. I would also add more colors to the product line. There is a light medium in neutral that seems to be missing. I know my exact color for your true skin concealer but that is not a color match option for deciding on this particular product. I think that's a mistake because they work well together. I used the concealer under this to give me more coverage and they worked flawlessly in tandem. Overall this is a good product. It doesn't lay in my fine lines and did feel good on my skin. I wore it all day. It did not rub off onto clothing. Bonus, it was compatible as a base with my SPF applied on top. I will most likely buy again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Thumb indent is genius.

faceoff_negative.comments: Generally I love Ilia's products but this one wasn't for me. I tried it several different ways daily for 1.5 weeks. I tried it on my bare face, I tried it after prepping my skin really well, I tried it with primer underneath, I tried it with sunscreen underneath, I tried it as a spot concealer, and as a foundation. Despite how I applied it directly to skin, with a sponge, with a brush, it never quite performed (in a long term sense) the way I wanted. Shade: I received the shade 12N Sycamore; it's not quite my right shade, but I can make it work. Experience: It feels a bit chalky. It doesn't absorb into the skin so much as it stays on top. It doesn't look bad though after the initial application. The formulation gives you a realistically matte finish. I didn't find that there was any separation or reaction with my skincare products. Typically I prefer my foundation to be sheer coverage so my freckles are still visible. This was able to provide the sheer coverage I am looking for. The challenges I experience were that I found the product tended to settle into my lines (for context I am 28 years old). Areas where I have dimples or smile crinkles tended to become more pronounced because they product would sink into those place. Ultimately this is what led me to not enjoy the experience so much. On the plus side, I do think the initial application is lovely. The product on the skin looks amazing at golden hour. It's really only the settling that I didn't enjoy (which with proactive consistent care, the settling can be resolved). Packaging: Packaging is nice. It has a soft matte feel. The tube has an indentation that is comfortable to hold. It is a stick foundation so you will have to swipe it on (either to the back of your hand or directly onto your face). I think if the product works well for you, it would be a great size to bring when traveling. Ultimately I won't be repurchasing, but I will continue to use it as a spot concealer. Please note: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wasn't for me, over time it settled into my lines
